channel.title: Solution on Suprema AI
channel.description: Recent content in Solution on Suprema AI

item.title: Q-Face Series
item.description: Q-Face Series Q-Face OEM module series are stand-alone facial recognition systems ideal for Edge AI embedded system applications where the most trusted touchless biometric security is required. Specifically, the modules are designed for manufacturers and system integrators seeking safe, reliable, and best-performing facial recognition systems that are environment-friendly, and easy-to-integrate, with flexible form factor capabilities. Sepecification Applications Biometric access control for highly secured areas

item.title: Q-Vision
item.description: Q-Vision TAILORED SOLUTION TO YOUR VISUAL DATA APPLICATIONS Q-Vision Engine is AI powered video analytic and face recognition solution for various domains such as intelligent CCTVs and AI Edge Cameras. By deep learning and convolutional neural networks to process video frames and extract features that distinguish different objects, Q-Vision Engine is designed to overcome the challenges of reliable data extraction and analysis in various video environments. Full SDK and API support will enhance seamless integration to your existing video security systems.

item.title: Q-Platform
item.description: Q-Platform A standardized optimization platform for the development of Edge AI algorithm. It provides high performance on Edge devices by optimizing the algorithm for low performance CPU with little loss of accuracy. Core Competency of Q-Platform The best performing hardware platform build Possessing over 20 Peta-FLOPS and 40 Peta-OPS deep learning hardware platform AI development software platform for the faster development Mass DB management and S/W tool development AI automation pipeline build Automation tool development for DB collection, cleansing, model learning and evaluation processes
